column5: This picture is of me(11 yrs old) holding up a trevalli jack and a garfish on holiday with my brother and sister(the kid with '66' on his shirt and the tallest person in the picture) and some local kids in Grenada 1978.  Cant believe how time flies.   Although my beautiful afro hair is sadly no more, one thing has remained constant in my life….MY LOVE OF FISHING AND THE OUTDOORS!

nice   Cool Picture Simon!   Thanks …...  Just going through some pictures to put together an album for my mum's 80th birthday……..got some really good pics to add, some of the shots of Jack and myself at the same age are scary when seen side by side….we are twins!!!!
My buddy James Boca comes from Grenada. We retired same day from General Motors.  Just joking, people always ask if you know James Boca he wears glasses. We all wore glasses.
